name: The Word Mage
description:
A word game where you fight your way through waves of enemies.

Created for GDKO 2023 - Round 1.

I tried to come up with a unique location for a word game. And I have also included some basic gameplay. Other levels will have different themes and creatures each with different abilities to battle.

Spell words using adjacent letter tiles to heal and defeat enemies.

Built with Godot.
